title: How To | Cover Dark Cirlces
description:
To cover dark circles caused by tired eyes, the first tip is to use a concealer that gets the job done. The Neutrogena HealthySkin Brightening Eye Perfector is a great go-to because of its lightweight liquid formula that makes it great for layering. 

Step 1: Start by applying concealer to the upper eye area in a backwards C formation. 

Step 2: Pat with ring finger. The heat from your finger will help blend the product seamlessly. 

Step 3: If you need more coverage, repeat this step until you see no more dark circles.

Follow our ‘How To’ series for more everyday makeup tips!
